description: Gets the details of a network operation, including the tasks involved in the network operation and the status of the tasks. A network operation is any operation that is done to your network, such as network instance instantiation or termination.

parameters.name: nsLcmOpOccId
parameters.description: The identifier of the network operation.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: Network operation ARN.

nested_items.name: detail
nested_items.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: A human-readable title of the problem type.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: ID of this network operation occurrence.

nested_items.name: lcmOperationType
nested_items.description: Type of the operation represented by this occurrence.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date that the resource was created.

nested_items.name: instantiateMetadata
nested_items.description: Metadata related to the network operation occurrence for network instantiation. This is populated only if the lcmOperationType is INSTANTIATE.

nested_items.name: additionalParamsForNs
nested_items.description: The configurable properties used during instantiation.

nested_items.name: nsdInfoId
nested_items.description: The network service descriptor used for instantiating the network instance.

nested_items.name: lastModified
nested_items.description: The date that the resource was last modified.

nested_items.name: modifyVnfInfoMetadata
nested_items.description: Metadata related to the network operation occurrence for network function updates in a network instance. This is populated only if the lcmOperationType is UPDATE and the updateType is MODIFY_VNF_INFORMATION.

nested_items.name: vnfConfigurableProperties
nested_items.description: The configurable properties used during update of the network function instance.

nested_items.name: vnfInstanceId
nested_items.description: The network function instance that was updated in the network instance.

nested_items.name: updateNsMetadata
nested_items.description: Metadata related to the network operation occurrence for network instance updates. This is populated only if the lcmOperationType is UPDATE and the updateType is UPDATE_NS.

nested_items.name: additionalParamsForNs
nested_items.description: The configurable properties used during update.

nested_items.name: nsdInfoId
nested_items.description: The network service descriptor used for updating the network instance.

nested_items.name: nsInstanceId
nested_items.description: ID of the network operation instance.

nested_items.name: operationState
nested_items.description: The state of the network operation.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: tasks
nested_items.description: All tasks associated with this operation occurrence.

nested_items.name: taskContext
nested_items.description: Context for the network operation task.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: taskEndTime
nested_items.description: Task end time.

nested_items.name: taskErrorDetails
nested_items.description: Task error details.

nested_items.name: cause
nested_items.description: Error cause.

nested_items.name: details
nested_items.description: Error details.

nested_items.name: taskName
nested_items.description: Task name.

nested_items.name: taskStartTime
nested_items.description: Task start time.

nested_items.name: taskStatus
nested_items.description: Task status.

nested_items.name: updateType
nested_items.description: Type of the update. Only present if the network operation lcmOperationType is UPDATE.
